final_goal: Minimal TUI for core transfer workflows on top of runtime-complete protocol implementation.

gates.title: Core download automation
gates.required: session download-auto succeeds in authenticated flow

gates.title: Release hardening and final closure
gates.required: config/log redaction, packaging, recovery runbooks, and closure checklist complete

capabilities.title: Protocol mapped and implemented
capabilities.notes: 131/131 implemented+mapped baseline reached in S4L and preserved.

capabilities.title: Runtime evidence for all protocol messages
capabilities.notes: Strict runtime closure is complete: verified_runtime=131 and verified_static=0.

capabilities.title: Semantic depth closure for partial tails
capabilities.notes: Stage 7 replaced residual raw tails with explicit extension-reserved semantics.

capabilities.title: Automated search-select-download flow in CLI/core
capabilities.notes: Core orchestration and `session download-auto` are implemented and regression-covered.

capabilities.title: Capabilities and critical-path dashboard
capabilities.notes: Expose blockers, gates, and critical path similarly to rsk_rs dashboards.

capabilities.title: Minimal TUI for core transfer
capabilities.notes: TUI v1 shell is available for login/search/select/download/monitor/upload decision flows.

capabilities.title: Redaction metadata hardening
capabilities.notes: Redacted metadata now stores repository-relative references or external placeholders; regression tests enforce this.

capabilities.title: Release packaging workflow
capabilities.notes: Published reproducible packaging script for CLI+TUI bundles with checksum output.

capabilities.title: Failure recovery runbooks
capabilities.notes: Published recovery runbook for auth/search/download/transfer/TUI operational failures.

capabilities.title: Final closure checklist and audit
capabilities.notes: Final checklist and executable release-hardening audit are published and integrated.

capabilities.title: Release hardening and final gates
capabilities.notes: Release hardening closure completed: redaction metadata, packaging, recovery runbooks, and closure audit are green.
